name: 2025 12th International Conference on Geological and Civil Engineering
content: Paper Publishing: Submitted papers will be sent to program committee members or external reviewers for peer review, and accepted papers will be published into Springer Series in Geomechanics and Geoengineering as a volume of post-proceedings. The books series is abstracted and indexed in EI Compendex, Scopus, Inspec, SCImago, etc.
